At first my kids didn't want to see this.  This wasn't their kind of movies.  I didn't have high expectations either.  However, the main actor who played Evan was the star of the show. He did an excellent job of potraying a nutty and off the wall character.
First time I've geniunely laughed in a long time.

- **Feedback on Performers:** Prefers standout lead actors who enhance the viewing experience, critiquing productions that fall short in this aspect.
- **Review Trends:** Tends to rate films positively if they evoke laughter and a sense of fun, showing a critical stance towards films presenting morally troubling content.
